#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

using namespace std;

int isPal( int n ) {
	
	int len, i;
	char *s = new char[ 6 ];
	
	sprintf( s, "%d", n );
	len = strlen( s );

	for( i = 0;i < len/2;i++ )
		if( s[ i ] != s[ len - i - 1 ] )
			return 0;

	return 1;
}

int main() {
	

	vector<int> A;
	int t, i, n, len;

	for( i = 1;i <= 100000;i++ )
		if( isPal( i ) )
			A.push_back( i );

	len = A.size();

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d", &n );

		for( i = 0;i < len;i++ )
			if( A[ i ] >= n ) {
				printf("%d\n", A[ i ] );
				break;
			}

	}

	return 0;
}
